scripts.init-deps: pnpm install && pnpm -F config install && pnpm -F common install && pnpm -F ui install && pnpm -F policy install && pnpm -F chat install && pnpm -F root install
scripts.up:dev:patch:config: pnpm -F config up:dev:patch && pnpm -F root up:dev:packages && pnpm -F policy up:dev:packages && pnpm -F chat up:dev:packages
scripts.up:dev:minor:config: pnpm -F config up:dev:minor && pnpm -F root up:dev:packages && pnpm -F policy up:dev:packages && pnpm -F chat up:dev:packages
scripts.up:dev:patch:common: pnpm -F common up:dev:patch && pnpm -F ui up:dev:packages && pnpm -F root up:dev:packages && pnpm -F chat up:dev:packages
scripts.up:dev:minor:common: pnpm -F common up:dev:minor && pnpm -F ui up:dev:packages && pnpm -F root up:dev:packages && pnpm -F chat up:dev:packages
scripts.up:dev:patch:ui: pnpm -F ui up:dev:patch && pnpm -F root up:dev:packages && pnpm -F policy up:dev:packages && pnpm -F chat up:dev:packages
scripts.up:dev:minor:ui: pnpm -F ui up:dev:minor && pnpm -F root up:dev:packages && pnpm -F policy up:dev:packages && pnpm -F chat up:dev:packages
